entry.title: Announcing my podcast, DEAR SCHUYLER! Episode 1 (with my dad) and Episode 2 (with Lia ThomS) are live now anywhere you get podcasts! This first episode with my dad is near and dear to my heart. He and my mom have been my biggest cheerleaders and grounding
entry.content: Announcing my podcast, DEAR SCHUYLER! Episode 1 (with my dad) and Episode 2 (with Lia ThomS) are live now anywhere you get podcasts! This first episode with my dad is near and dear to my heart. He and my mom have been my biggest cheerleaders and grounding forces in my life - and it's taken work to get here. I hope you love the conversation as much as I did. Spoiler alert. We both did some crying. #transgender #trans #dearschuyler #podcast #gender #transpodcast #transkids #transman #parentsoftranskids #comingout #lgbtq #pride

entry.title: Every media outlet has tried to tell Lia's story for her. It's time for Lia to tell it herself. Check out Episode 2 of DEAR SCHUYLER with Lia Thomas on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, YouTube, or anywhere you get your podcasts. For anyone wondering about fairnes
entry.content: Every media outlet has tried to tell Lia's story for her. It's time for Lia to tell it herself. Check out Episode 2 of DEAR SCHUYLER with Lia Thomas on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, YouTube, or anywhere you get your podcasts. For anyone wondering about fairness in sports when including trans athletes, register for my workshop "Trans Athletes Belong In Sport" at pinkmantaray.com/workshops to get a whole breakdown supported by research and facts. DEAR SCHUYLER is brought to you by @diversionpods 🎤 #transathlete #liathomas #dearschuyler #transgender

entry.title: Transphobia is perpetuated theough fearmongering and lying. If you read Megyn's tweet and agrees with her - youre being tricked. @netflix do better. #transgender #transathlete #transwomen #sports #womenssports #transwomenarewomen #trans #transgenderathlet

entry.title: Unsurprisingly, we received many comments arguing about the fairness of including trans women in women's sports. So I sat down with scientist, researcher, and doctoral candidate Joanna Harper to discuss! Take a listen to this DEAR SCHUYLER episode on Spot
entry.content: Unsurprisingly, we received many comments arguing about the fairness of including trans women in women's sports. So I sat down with scientist, researcher, and doctoral candidate Joanna Harper to discuss! Take a listen to this DEAR SCHUYLER episode on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, YouTube, or wherever you get your podcasts! And, if you're looking for a deeper dive on how to have these conversations about trans athletes, sign up for a workshop at pinkmantaray.com/workshops 🏳️‍⚧️🙏🏼💕 #dearschuyler #podcast #transgender

entry.title: It was such a joy to sit down with @Dylan Mulvaney and chat about how we hold onto ourselves, our truths, and our joy as openly trans people in this often very transphobic world. Take a listen to this newest episode of DEAR SCHUYLER anywhere you get your
entry.content: It was such a joy to sit down with @Dylan Mulvaney and chat about how we hold onto ourselves, our truths, and our joy as openly trans people in this often very transphobic world. Take a listen to this newest episode of DEAR SCHUYLER anywhere you get your podcasts! And if you have a question you'd like me to address, send me a voice note here or at dearschuyler.com 🙏🏼💕🏳️‍⚧️ Brought to you by @Diversion Audio 🎤 #dearschuyler #transgender #boundaries #dylanmulvaney
